Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: Neilian Drive cuts through two dense forest regions on both sides.
Room.LongDescription: Two dense forests are separated by Neilian Drive as it cuts through the thick brush. It is unsure whether or not there was a natural break between the two forests or whether the forest was carved out to make way for this bypass. No one ever seems to enter or exit from the forests, so it would seem that no one would care.
